title: Candidates for driving instructor examination informed to apply before 15th March
content: The Department of Motor Traffic states that the written examination for registration of driving instructors and assistant driving Instructors of the Department of Motor Traffic will be held in Colombo in June 2022. While the examination notice has been made public by the Gazette Notification No. 2265 dated 28.01.2022, applications from eligible Sri Lankan citizens will be accepted by the Commissioner General of Examinations until 15th March.
